nodes.text: Edrio "Two Tubes" was a male Tognath mercenary pilot who flew alongside his eggmate, Benthic. The two shared the nickname derived from the breathing apparatus that allowed their Tognath physiology to process oxygen atmospheres. Edrio's homeworld Yar Togna was conquered and occupied by the Galactic Empire, forcing him to flee as a refugee. Desiring to strike back at the Empire, Edrio and Benthic had allied with Saw Gerrera some time before the Battle of Yavin.
After the Empire conquered and occupied Yar Togna, Edrio and his eggmate, Benthic, joined Saw Gerrera's Partisans.

Edrio flew a U-wing transport with Gerrera. Together, they both attacked the Marauder. They rescued the Spectres Ezra Bridger and Sabine Wren from the Jalindi Station before dropping proton bombs that destroyed both the relay and the Marauder.

The group then traveled to Faos Station. There, he dropped Gerrera and the others off and was told by Gerrera to follow his signal. Edrio then followed Gerrera's signal to the Tonnis sector, where the Galactic Empire attempted to transfer a kyber crystal to Captain Slavin's Star Destroyer. Edrio then completed his rendezvous with Gerrera after he caused the crystal to explode. They made their escape before the crystal exploded.
Sometime later, Edrio and the rest of the Partisans raided an Imperial Metal Factory on Dooma 4 after learning the factory had provided components for a secret Imperial project.
In 0 BBY, Edrio perished on Jedha near Jedha City with many of his Partisan comrades, when the Empire's new superweapon, the First Death Star, fired upon the city.

Edrio was a male Tognath who wore a breathing apparatus in order to process oxygen atmospheres. Edrio was close with his eggmate Benthic, who both hated the Empire for invading their homeworld of Yar Togna. Their hatred for the Empire led them to join Saw Gerrera's militant Partisans.

The character Edrio "Two Tubes" was created and developed for the 2016 film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. The costume of Edrio "Two Tubes" was first revealed on July 20, 2016 at San Diego Comic-Con International, along with an official description for the character which was posted on the official Star Wars Facebook page on the same day.
He was portrayed by Aidan Cook in the film and voiced by David Acord in Star Wars Rebels.
